content.text:
# Plan Product

Plan a new product and install Agent OS in its codebase.

Refer to the instructions located in @~/.agent-os/instructions/plan-product.md


ARGUMENTS: create  Rails-based forms to replace the current Google Forms for reimbursement requests, vendor payments, and in-kind donations. The Rails application will integrate with existing Google Sheets by appending approved payments directly to the sheets currently used by NB-Finances Python scripts. must have a flexible account/team structure
I'll help you plan a Rails-based forms application to replace Google Forms for financial requests. Let me gather the necessary information to set up Agent OS for this project.

input.prompt:
Plan a Rails-based forms application to replace Google Forms for reimbursement requests, vendor payments, and in-kind donations. The app needs to integrate with existing Google Sheets used by NB-Finances Python scripts and have a flexible account/team structure.

Key requirements from user:
- Rails-based forms for reimbursement requests, vendor payments, in-kind donations
- Integration with existing Google Sheets (append approved payments)
- Flexible account/team structure
- Must work with existing NB-Finances Python scripts

Execute the plan-product instructions from @~/.agent-os/instructions/plan-product.md
